settings.subheading: Discover machine bead embroidery fabrics, born for brilliant design.

settings.text: Our hybrid model of computerized precision and artisanal finishing ensures your custom fabric is both flawless and full of soul.
settings.title: Precision Embroidery

settings.description: Consistency and speed are critical for us. Fominte's advanced machinery ensures that the bulk order perfectly matches the approved sample, every time. Their massive production capacity and predictable delivery times have made them our most reliable partner for embellished fabrics.
settings.title: David Chen（Production Manager）

settings.description: As an independent designer, the rapid and efficient sampling process at Fominte is a game-changer. They were able to take my initial concept and produce a stunning, high-quality sample that perfectly captured my vision. Their willingness to work on smaller, custom runs and their expert guidance make them an invaluable partner for a growing brand.
settings.title: Chloe Park（Independent Designer）

settings.description: Fominte's team are true artists. Their ability to translate our complex couture concepts into fabric is unparalleled. The combination of machine precision for the base and meticulous hand-finishing for the 3D elements gives us the consistency we need without sacrificing the soul of the garment. They are not just a supplier; they are an essential creative partner.
settings.title: Isabelle Dubois（Creative Director）

settings.description: Finding a partner who truly understands the aesthetic nuances of the Middle Eastern market is rare. Fominte's extensive library of exclusive patterns is an incredible starting point, and their R&D team worked with us to create a custom design that was perfect for our latest collection. The quality is exceptional.
settings.title: Fatima Al-Jamil（Dubai-based Kaftan Label Founder）

settings.description: We manage a complex global supply chain, and Fominte is one of our most dependable suppliers. Their deep experience in international trade means logistics are always smooth, and their communication is consistently clear and professional. They deliver a high-quality, certified product on time, which is exactly what we need.
settings.title: Marco Rossi（Global Sourcing Director）

settings.html:
Application

Customization

Fabric Care

FAQ

Our Commitment

Applications

We are a global partner in celebrating heritage. Our fabrics are used to create significant traditional garments for ceremonies, festivals, and celebrations around the world.

Bridal & Weddings>

From the sacred vow to the grand celebration, every moment of a wedding deserves to be draped in perfection. Our fabrics are crafted to make these moments unforgettable.

The Essence of the Gown: Our collection of silks, tulles, and embellished fabrics provides the perfect canvas with stunning drape and luxurious feel.

Our Embellishments' Role: Our signature beadwork, 3D floral appliques, and delicate sequins can transform a simple gown into a work of art, catching the light with every step the bride takes.

Beyond the Bride: Our versatile fabrics also cater to the entire bridal party, from elegant bridesmaid dresses to sophisticated mother-of-the-bride attire.

Kaftans & Abayas>

Embodying grace and sophistication, Kaftans and Abayas are timeless garments where fabric is paramount. We provide textiles that honor tradition while embracing modern luxury.

The Art of Draping: The beauty of a Kaftan lies in its fluid silhouette. Our lightweight crepes, silks, and chiffons offer exceptional drape, creating elegant lines and movement.

Subtle & Sophisticated Embellishments: We specialize in refined details like delicate beadwork along the cuffs or intricate embroidery on the neckline, adding a touch of bespoke luxury.

Saris & Lehengas>

Vibrant, opulent, and steeped in tradition, Saris and Lehengas are the heart of South Asian celebrations. Our fabrics provide a magnificent canvas for these iconic ensembles.

A Canvas for Celebration: Our base fabrics are engineered to support elaborate, heavy embroidery like Zardozi and Aari work, ensuring the final piece is both breathtaking and durable.

Vibrant Color Palettes: Our advanced double-sided digital printing and dyeing capabilities allow us to achieve deep, saturated hues and complex patterns with exceptional clarity.

Evening & Gala Gowns>

For moments in the spotlight, a gown must be nothing short of spectacular. Our collection is designed to create show-stopping looks for galas, red carpets, and black-tie events.

Red Carpet Radiance: We specialize in fabrics that command attention, from all-over sequined textiles that create a "liquid metal" effect to tulles intricately beaded with crystals.

Structural Elegance: A memorable gown requires both beauty and form. Our embellished fabrics can provide structural support for dramatic skirts and fitted bodices, allowing for ambitious designs.

Headwear & Veils>

The finishing touch to a perfect ensemble, headwear and veils demand the utmost delicacy. Our fine fabrics provide the ethereal foundation for these critical accessories.

The Ethereal Veil: A veil should be a whisper of beauty. Our ultra-fine, lightweight tulles are incredibly soft and sheer, creating a romantic, cloud-like effect.

Intricate Headpieces: From traditional head coverings to modern fascinators, our fabric bases are stable enough for intricate beadwork and strong enough to be shaped into complex forms.

Cultural Celebrations>

We are a global partner in celebrating heritage, creating significant traditional garments for ceremonies, festivals, and celebrations around the world.

A Global Palette: From the rich brocades of a Nigerian Aso Ebi to the vibrant silks of a Vietnamese Ao Dai, we understand the importance of cultural authenticity.

Versatility in Embellishment: Our advanced technology allows us to adapt to a vast array of traditional motifs, from African wax prints to Asian-inspired floral embroidery.

Customization & Partnership

We are dedicated to being the most valuable link in your product development chain, helping you achieve the perfect balance of design, cost, and market performance.

Custom Design Process>

Our structured process includes: Consultation & Quote, where we discuss your concept and provide a quote/MOQ; Sampling, with a typical lead time of one week; Sample Approval, where we ship the sample for your feedback; and Bulk Production upon approval.

Design Confidentiality>

Absolutely. We treat all custom projects with strict confidentiality. Your design is your intellectual property, and we will never disclose or sell your exclusive patterns to any third party.

A Caring Company>

We believe that our talented team is our greatest asset. Our BSCI certification is a testament to our commitment to fair labor practices and a safe, healthy, and respectful working environment for all our employees.

Connecting with You, Across the Globe>

We actively participate in major textile exhibitions worldwide to connect with industry peers and clients. We also warmly welcome visitors from around the world to tour our factory and witness our production capabilities and professional spirit firsthand.

Let the Beauty of Craftsmanship Continue

Every piece of bead embroidery fabric is a work of art that deserves to be cherished gently. To ensure this beauty can accompany you for a long time, we have prepared these thoughtful care tips.

Professional Dry-Cleaning Only>

We only recommend professional dry-cleaning. Washing can damage delicate embellishments. Dry-cleaning is like a gentle spa that nurtures every detail, preserves the shine, and maintains the perfect silhouette of the fabric.

How to Handle Minor Stains>

For small, localized stains: Blot, Don't Rub to absorb excess liquid. Gently dab the stain from the outside in with a cloth dampened with cool water and a mild, neutral detergent. "Rinse" by dabbing with a clean, damp cloth, then lay flat to air dry.

What to Avoid (The "Don'ts")>

To prevent permanent damage, please strictly avoid: Do Not Machine Wash, Do Not Hand Wash or Rub, Do Not Tumble Dry, Do Not Bleach, Do Not Wring or Twist, and Avoid Direct Sunlight Exposure.

Ironing & Storage>

Ironing: The best method is to use a handheld steamer on a low heat setting at a safe distance. If using an iron, turn the garment inside out, use the lowest heat setting, and place a pressing cloth between the iron and the garment. NEVER apply the iron directly to beaded areas.

Storage: Use wide, padded hangers to support the garment's shape. Protect it in a breathable garment bag and avoid overcrowding in the closet to prevent snags.

Frequently Asked Questions

Are your embellished fabrics machine-made or handmade?>

Our craftsmanship combines the best of both worlds. We use state-of-the-art computerized machinery for the base embroidery to ensure consistency, then our skilled artisans perform meticulous hand-finishing for elements like 3D flowers or feathers.

What is your MOQ?>

Our MOQ varies by product. For our in-stock items, it's typically 100 yards. For custom designs, the MOQ will be higher based on complexity and materials. Please contact our sales team for specifics.

How can I get samples?>

We offer A4-sized swatches for quality evaluation and sample yardage for prototyping. Swatches may be free or subject to a small fee, while yardage is charged by the meter/yard. Please send us the product codes you are interested in. Kindly note, all shipping and freight costs for samples are borne by the client.

What are your payment terms?>

Our standard payment term is a 50% deposit before production and the 50% balance before shipment. More flexible terms may be discussed for long-term clients.

Do you ship to my country?>

Yes, we ship globally. With extensive experience exporting to over 120 countries, we can arrange reliable freight to your nearest port or designated commercial address. All shipping, freight, and customs clearance costs are the responsibility of the customer. We will provide all necessary documentation to facilitate a smooth process.

Still Have Questions?>

If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, or if you wish to discuss your specific project in greater detail, please do not hesitate to reach out. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you. Contact us directly at: Derek@fominte.com

Our Commitment

Our promise is woven into every fiber we produce. We are committed to delivering unparalleled quality, innovative design, and a partnership you can trust through measurable standards.

Commitment to Speed & Efficiency>

We understand that speed-to-market is critical for your success. Our streamlined process ensures your vision becomes a reality, fast.

  • Rapid Sampling: We pledge to deliver satisfactory custom samples for your approval within 7 working days.
  • Reliable Delivery: Once approved, we guarantee that standard bulk orders will be ready for shipment within 30 days. This predictability allows you to plan your collections with confidence.
Commitment to Responsive Service>

Clear and timely communication is the foundation of a great partnership. Our dedicated team is always accessible, ensuring your questions are answered and your project never loses momentum.

  • Online Inquiries: For messages received via our online chat during business hours, we commit to a response time of under 2 hours.
  • Email Correspondence: All email inquiries will receive a comprehensive reply within 24 hours.
Commitment to Quality & Partnership>

Beyond speed and service, our ultimate commitment is to the integrity of our product and the strength of our relationship. We stand behind every yard of fabric, ensuring it meets global standards and your highest expectations. We are more than a supplier; we are a dedicated partner in your success, committed to design confidentiality and ethical practices.

Our Manufacturing Infrastructure
Scalable production capabilities backing your global supply chain.

settings.text:
Precision Powered by Automation At Fominte, we redefine high-end mesh embroidery through state-of-the-art automation and smart logistics. We meticulously select premium yarns—from multi-layered sequins to heavy beadwork—to construct rich visual dimensions on delicate mesh.

The Warmth of Artisan Detail Beyond mechanical precision lies the soul of our craft. Our design team translates global trends into exquisite textures, while our hand-finished details ensure every fabric brings brilliance to your haute couture masterpieces.
